title: Ambrosia
description: This drink of the gods is an adventuring must-have. Upon consumation the adventurer will gain the blessing of the gods.

title: Blade of Souls
description: This blade has taken the lives of many and trapped them inside. If you're alright with a faint whispering this blade is the best.

title: Spellbook
description: A book containing beginner level spells. Great for a new adventurer looking for an introduction to the arcane.

title: Dagger Set
description: A set of the finest daggers in the west. These blades won't dull and work nicely in a pinch. Set includes four daggers, sheath not included.

title: Bottled Death
description: Beware the contents of this bottle. Skin contact will result in an instant death that is irreversible. Consider yourself warned.

title: Frost Sword
description: A fine blade that leaves it's target frozen. Even the most experienced adventurers seek out this blade. Wielding the blade for too long will result in frostbite.

title: Health Potion
description: The Health Potion is an adventuring necessity that will restore you to proper health from any non-fatal wounds. Any attempt to bring back the dead will prove unsuccessfull.

title: Long Sword
description: This standard long sword is a classic. Perfect for your typical small monsters like orc but in the hands of an expert it can slay even the most deadly of beasts.

title: Magic Mushroom
description: Enter the forest with a magical touch, And find a mushroom that's just as much. Its colors and shapes are out of sight, A truly enchanting and mystical delight.

title: Sleeping Mushroom
description: Upon eating this mushroom the adventurer will fall into a death-like state for a day. If unbothered, they will wake up well rested and ready to go on their way.

title: Paper Sword
description: This trinket won't do much good against foe, but it is a great gift for young folk. All the thrill of being an adventurer without the risk of losing an eye.

title: Potion of Poisin
description: This potion will send any creature into a wretched state, ending with their demise. Perfect for arrow tips or drink slips.

title: Wand
description: Traditional wand for arcane practices and standard spells. Any attempt at necromancy with this wand will have poor results.

title: Wand and Spellbook
description: This classic combo will have any up and coming adventurer ready for whatever they may face. Sold at a discount price.

title: Wizard
description: Adventuring alone is dangerous, so hire a wizard for your next adventure. Capable of summoning, combat, and necromancy.
